document_data.name: Spiderbind
document_data.Effects: Similar to the ''[[slow]]'' spell, this spell made a targeted creature slower in their actions and reflexes. As the spell was developed to primarily target [[spiderkind]], it also protected against poisonous attacks.
document_data.Components: In addition to [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components, this spell required a [[material component]].
document_data.History: This spell was created by the [[Church of Eilistraee]] to defend its clerics against the spiderkind creatures who served [[Lolth]].
